amendatorysection.catchline: Entry permit program; commission; rules and regulations; enforce.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The commission may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations as are necessary to administer the entry permit program and to carry out the purposes and intents of sections 37-434 to 37-446.
(2) The commission, its agents and officers, and any other peace officer of this state shall be empowered to enforce the provisions of sections 37-434 to 37-446.
